## Load the library
```{r library, echo= T}
suppressWarnings(suppressMessages(library(plotly)))
```

It's going to used the mtcars data because it is part of the R data

```{r loaddata, echo = T}
data("mtcars")
# suppress warnings  
storeWarn<- getOption("warn")
options(warn = -1) 
```

## Including Plot



```{r plot, echo = T}
plot_ly() %>%  add_trace(data = mtcars,x = ~mpg, y = ~hp,color = ~cyl,
                         type = 'scatter',mode ='markers') %>% layout(title ="MPG vs HP")
```
